Visa sponsorship is not available.Duties:o Interpret data, analyze results using statistical techniques and provide ongoing reports o Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets o Filter and clean data by reviewing computer reports, printouts, and performance indicators to locate and correct code problems o Work with management to prioritize business and information needs o Locate and define new process improvement opportunities - provided by Dice Data, analysis
